mapper.insert: INSERT INTO funding(funding_code, id, start_date, exp_date, delivery_date, status_code) VALUES(null, #{id}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW(), 10);
mapper.select: SELECT f.funding_code, id, title, start_date, exp_date, target_amount, introduction, fmi.name AS file_name, size, location, t.tag_code, t.name AS tag_name, s.cml_amount, s.percentage FROM funding f, funding_main_image fmi, funding_tag ft, tag t, (SELECT funding.funding_code, IFNULL(SUM(reward_order.quantity * reward.amount), 0) AS cml_amount, IFNULL(FLOOR(SUM(reward_order.quantity * reward.amount) / funding.target_amount * 100), 0) AS percentage FROM funding LEFT OUTER JOIN reward ON funding.funding_code = reward.funding_code LEFT OUTER JOIN reward_order ON reward.reward_code = reward_order.reward_code GROUP BY funding.funding_code) s WHERE f.funding_code = fmi.funding_code AND f.funding_code = ft.funding_code AND ft.tag_code = t.tag_code AND status_code = 40 AND s.funding_code = f.funding_code ORDER BY f.funding_code DESC;
